subject: Optimize chat performance with pagination and database improvements
body:
- Implement message pagination: Load 50 most recent messages first instead of entire history
- Add infinite scroll to load older messages on demand when scrolling up
- Fix slow pg_timezone_names query (0.24s) by replacing timezone('utc', now()) with now()
- Improve initial chat load time and reduce unnecessary data transfer
- Add loading indicator when fetching older messages
title: Optimize chat performance with pagination and database improvements
